attributes.title: HELP
attributes.review: 💕✨🧚🏻‍♂️🙈I downloaded this app with confidence to support my very favorite president! When I opened the app it lead me to eating my dead rats ashes and pooping on my parents. Very disappointed!💕✨🙈🧚🏻‍♂️

attributes.title: A Message From Gen Z And The Barbs🦄🍊
attributes.review:
as I fellow trump supporter and 𝒜𝓂𝑒𝓇𝒾𝒸𝓊𝒽🇺🇸 was devastated to even post on the app it was glitchy and hard to use sorry oh dearest president I have failed😔

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I wish you could just give 0 stars. This app needs to leave ASAP 👺

attributes.title: 𝙷𝚘𝚛𝚛𝚒𝚋𝚕𝚎❤️
attributes.review: I’ve lost Brain cells🌈🥰🧚🏻‍♀️just by looking at the trump 2020, but then my eyes started bleeding at the view on donald j Trump. please do not put any one else through this tourture 🌈🌈✨✨✨🌸🌸🤩🤩🥰🥰and destroy the app🌸🌸🥰🥰🌈🌈

attributes.title: Does not function at all!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see D-Trump 🤩🤩🤩🤩 but i didn’t see it at all!! It was covered by the misogyny and racism but oh well.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is so bad :( this app should be banned and so should trump ❤️💖send him back to where HE came from 💕( ;) gen z is coming for you trump ❤️

attributes.title: FAKE NEWS!
attributes.review: this app is unbelievable, i have great suspicion they’ve partnered up with CNN. I believe President Trump would never allow this under his name! a disgusting app!
Literally horrible experience. I downloaded the app and the just looking at the it makes me want to vomit🧚‍♀️✨✨ DONT get it, it’s so horrible

attributes.title: Gross
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app and then as soon as that man popped up on my screen by phone started RADIATING this AWFUL awful STENCH. I am so disgusted and I hope this app is removed immediately 😡😡😡😡🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬😾😾😾😾😾😾😾😾😿😿😿GRRRRRR

attributes.title: oh to see without my eyes ︶👄 ︶
attributes.review: i think this app has some kind of curse on it. once i downloaded it, immediately, my dog got shot into space and then send us a text telling us that he was on mars. then, my parents decided to get a divorce after my grandmother spontaneously combusted. smh.
